sources.title: Outcast of the Islands
sources.description: Title: Outcast of the Islands Summary: A man occupies a position of trust with a merchant in an East Asian port. He's sacked when he's caught stealing, but he pretends to commit suicide, and a Captain he befriended agrees to take him to a secret trading post. Directed by: Carol Reed Actors: Ralph Richardson, Trevor Howard, Robert Morley Production Company: London Film Productions Release Date: 11 July 1952 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A man occupies a position of trust with a merchant in an East Asian port. He's sacked when he's caught stealing, but he pretends to commit suicide, and a Captain he befriended agrees to take him to a secret trading post.

metadata.Plot: A man occupies a position of trust with a merchant in an East Asian port. He's sacked after he's caught stealing, but he pretends to commit suicide, and a Captain he befriended agrees to take him to a secret trading post.
metadata.Actors: Ralph Richardson, Trevor Howard, Robert Morley
